pullrequest.title: Add support for building MATLAB .mex on Linux (#11)

content.raw: I'm testing this for backwards compatibility on Windows right now. Carlos had told me that the `.m` files, the Matlab example and the `.mex` end up in `build\install\Debug\lib\haptix-comm\mex`, but on this branch they end up in `build\install\Debug\lib\haptix-comm\matlab`. Will we need to change documentation and the SDK generation process to reflect this?
content.html: I'm testing this for backwards compatibility on Windows right now. Carlos had told me that the .m files, the Matlab example and the .mex end up in build\install\Debug\lib\haptix-comm\mex, but on this branch they end up in build\install\Debug\lib\haptix-comm\matlab. Will we need to change documentation and the SDK generation process to reflect this?
